channel.title: People cant log in to my server?
channel.description: The old problem is solved...now i need help...People cant log in to my server,i've send him the same client as mine,but with my ip (78.60.197.106) and im using same client with ip 127.0.0.1 ,he says he cant log in,server is online...idk why he cant..what should i do?

item.title: People cant log in to my server?
item.dc:creator: @ernis11231 ernis11231
item.description:
@ernis11231 wrote:

no,my server is not online…I still kinda “coding” it lol,making commands,editing somes,changing various skill xp,deleting neccesary objects,editing some of commands like ::pure was for playerights 0 etc,now im stuck with teleports,cant find how to change coords at client.java hehe…gonna look for it.

EDIT:

NEW PROBLEM,I SEND CLIENT WITH MY IP TO MY FRIEND BUT…HE CANT LOG IN…I DID EVERYTHING OKAY… PUTTED MY IP AND ETC. SERVER IS ONLINE…BUT HE CANT LOG IN.

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

When you are connecting to a server that you are running on the same computer, you need to connect to the host which is 127.0.0.1
